skill.s1.name: Frozen Presence
skill.s1.description: Deal [color=#00adff][b]Ice damage[/b][/color] to all foes equal to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of Yusuke's [color=#00adff][b]Defense[/b][/color]
Inflict [color=#00adff][b][i]Freeze[/i][/b][/color] on main target for 2 turns.
skill.s2.name: Bone-Chilling Cold
skill.s2.description: Deal [color=#00adff][b]Ice damage[/b][/color] to random foes equal to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of Yusuke's [color=#00adff][b]Defense[/b][/color] (5 hits).
When Yusuke has a [color=#00adff][b]shield[/b][/color], increase damage by [color=#00adff][b]30%[/b][/color].

From the second attack onwards, prioritize new targets and decrease damage by [color=#00adff][b]60%[/b][/color] for each repeated hit on the same target (max decrease to [color=#00adff][b]20%[/b][/color]).
skill.s3.name: Keen Eye
skill.s3.description: [color=#7baedd][b]Imagination[/b][/color]: Increase chance of counterattack to [color=#00adff][b]100%[/b][/color], increase damage by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of [color=#00adff][b]Defense[/b][/color], and change target to all foes.
If the effect is not activated by the start of Yusuke's next action, automatically activate it.

For 2 turns, gain a [color=#00adff][b]shield[/b][/color] equal to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of Yusuke's [color=#00adff][b]Defense[/b][/color] ï¼‹ [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color], increase Fire resistance, and nullify spiritual ailments.
Also inflict Taunt on all foes for 2 turns.
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Deal [color=#00adff][b]Ice damage[/b][/color] to all foes equal to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of Yusuke's [color=#00adff][b]Defense[/b][/color].
Increase chance of activating [color=#c16d92][b]Inspiration[/b][/color] counterattacks by [color=#00adff][b]35%[/b][/color] for 3 turns.
skill.p1.name: Painter's Focus
skill.p1.description: Each time a [color=#00adff][b]shield[/b][/color] is gained, increase [color=#00adff][b]damage dealt[/b][/color] to foes by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.p2.name: Artist's Intuition
skill.p2.description: Each time a [color=#00adff][b]shield[/b][/color] is gained with Yusuke's skills, increase Yusuke's [color=#00adff][b]pierce rate[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 1 turn.
awareness.a0.name: Inspiration
awareness.a0.description: When taking damage from a foe's skill, 65% chance to counterattack via [color=#c16d92][b]Resonance[/b][/color] effect and deal [color=#00adff][b]Ice damage[/b][/color] equal to [color=#00adff][b]88%[/b][/color] of [color=#00adff][b]Defense[/b][/color].
Change this effect to [color=#7baedd][b]Imagination[/b][/color] by using a skill.
awareness.a1.name: Natural Talent
awareness.a1.description: Every 2 times [ref=s3][color=#665d9d][b][u]Keen Eye[/u][/b][/color][/ref] is used, activate [color=#7baedd][b]Imagination[/b][/color] 1 time as a follow-up.
Counterattacks activated by this effect deal [color=#00adff][b]70%[/b][/color] of the original damage.
awareness.a2.name: A Breaktaking Sight
awareness.a2.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s3][color=#665d9d][b][u]Keen Eye[/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=hl][color=#665d9d][b][u]Highlight[/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 3.
awareness.a3.name: Both Beauty and Vice
awareness.a3.description: When Yusuke's [color=#00adff][b]HP[/b][/color] is above [color=#00adff][b]70%[/b][/color], increase counterattack damage dealt to foes by [color=#00adff][b]35%[/b][/color].
awareness.a4.name: With a Single Stroke
awareness.a4.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s1][color=#665d9d][b][u]Frozen Presence[/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=s2][color=#665d9d][b][u]Bone-Chilling Cold[/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 3.
awareness.a5.name: Still Life
awareness.a5.description: [b][ref=hl][color=#665d9d][u]Highlight[/u][/color][/ref] Enhanced[/b]: After using a [ref=hl][color=#665d9d][b][u]Highlight[/u][/b][/color][/ref], increase counterattack damage by [color=#00adff][b]30%[/b][/color] for 3 turns.
awareness.a6.name: Finishing Touches
awareness.a6.description: Change the effects of [color=#c16d92][b]Inspiration[/b][/color] and [color=#7baedd][b]Imagination[/b][/color] to [color=#a02159][b]Vision & Emotion[/b][/color] and [color=#2ecade][b]Creation[/b][/color].
Make their counterattacks 2 consecutive attacks, each dealing [color=#00adff][b]90%[/b][/color] of the original attack's damage.
